title: The history and fate of sacrilege discover'd by examples of scripture, of heathens, and of Christians; from the beginning of the world continually to this day / by Sir Henry Spelman ...
author: Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
notes: "A treatise omitted in the late edition of his Posthumous Works, and now published for the terror of evil doers."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
